summary:

I have a strong knowledge of Cost Management, excellent knowledge of SAP and MS Office Package and fair knowledge of Primavera. Open-minded, problem solver, I adapt quickly to new and international environments.
I have a positive attitude; I'm always deeply involved in my job and strongly result oriented.
